about_the_game: The official soundtrack for Bloodless sets the perfect mood for drinking tea by the bonfire after a long day of dodging boulders and katanas. Created by composer Felipe Barbosa of developer Point ‘n Sheep, the Bloodless original soundtrack is 34 tracks of ambient bliss.
